message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SD 

This paper discusses the challenges and algorithms used to build automatic narration systems, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the use of statistical data and the limited contribution of experts suggest that the paper may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper may also be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing) as it involves processing and narrating large volumes of information.
